title: Why cant we trade x amount of keys for a box?

replies.body: Play ARAM. Enjoy the free boxes.

> [{quoted}](name=VortexV9,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XhFO3FEE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-13T17:59:54.136+0000)

I have 42 keys
XD

:O :O :O :O You're OTP? xD you even got other champs bought?

yeah i only play a few champs

If you want more boxes play more champions.

I recommend playing them support, regardless of the champion, and just ward all game every game, and don't die.
